title: The Dogfish Head x Priority Bicycles weekend trail riding party includes release of special edition bike
content:
Dogfish Head’s potent brews can lay you out, but the brand encourages its constituents to exercise before jumping into a “recovery” session. That’s why it’s partnering with Priority Bicycles to throw a weekend-long ride-and-imbibe event at its Inn space in coastal Delaware. The brands invite riders of all levels to visit the Dogfish Inn in

The post The Dogfish Head x Priority Bicycles weekend trail riding party includes release of special edition bike appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Sam Anderson
